DOC.HEAD: Talk, Game Show Host Marries Maryland Model
Eds: Lesly is cq
DOC.TEXT: Talk and game show host Pat Sajak married former Playboy model Lesly Brown in a private ceremony Sunday. Sajak, 42, married Brown, 24, in a 40-minute ceremony at St. Mary's Roman Catholic Church as about 10 police officers stood guard outside. Information about the ceremony was sketchy because the couple sold exclusive rights to the nuptials to People magazine. Brown is a University of Maryland graduate and former ``Miss Georgetown'' who appeared in Playboy magazine's 1988 ``Women of Washington'' feature. She met the host of ``The Pat Sajak Show'' and ``Wheel of Fortune'' at the celebrity opening of a restaurant in Irvine, Calif., in 1988. Few celebrities were counted among the 100-150 guests, but Sajak's wheel turner and close friend, Vanna White, was spotted dodging from the church.
